nodes.long_description:
Wander the world openly through the magic of VR. From the comfort of your living room you can teleport almost anywhere in the world - whether you wish to walk across the London Bridge, stroll the gardens of the Taj Mahal, or witness the enormity of the Great Pyramids of Egypt - unlimited exploration awaits!

Notable features include speech recognition for searching, Wikipedia integration for location-based learning, historical jumping to witness changes over the years, multiple navigation modes and more.

Note: This app uses data from Google StreetView but is not an official Google product.

nodes.change_log:
v0.3393
• Improvements to voice communication including echo cancellation, automatic gain control, and audio codec changes
• Lip sync for avatars
• Fixes for Go/Quest multiplayer audio
• Fixed connection back to Alcove for players starting Wander from Alcove
• Minor UI improvements
• Performance improvements
• Potential fix for rare bug where some users who are unable to load locations

v0.3392
• Improved search and fixed a regression where search could place users too far from their intended destination
• Fix for occasional frame drops when loading new locations
• Updated speech recognition plugin. 
• Removed Exit to Oculus Home on the dock as it does not appear to work well with the new focus aware menu from Oculus

v0.3381
• Fixed a bug that could prevent application from loading for some users
• Fixed a bug that could prevent player markers from showing up in multiplayer if the map was closed when a player joined
• Improved messaging (and logging) when errors occur during startup
• Controls improved when using a single controller

v0.3376
• Fixed issue where in some locations the teleportation marker would be excessively large
• Fixed a bug that could prevent the renaming of favorites
• Fixed a bug where some locations that did not have high resolution imagery could fail to load with max resolution set
• Fixed laser appearing in center of vision when bringing up the new focus aware Oculus menu
• Updated collections
• Improved thumbnail loading in collections (should be faster when scrolling)
• Map no longer registers drags as clicks when the map is dragged back to its original location
• Improved reliability of random search
• Improved reliability of search on map when zoomed out
• Improved voice quality and reliability
• Boosted voice volume
• Minor UI improvements
• Slightly improved application startup time

v0.3376
• Fixed issue where in some locations the teleportation marker would be excessively large
• Fixed a bug that could prevent the renaming of favorites
• Fixed a bug where some locations that did not have high resolution imagery could fail to load with max resolution set
• Updated collections
• Improved thumbnail loading in collections (should be faster when scrolling)
• Map no longer registers drags as clicks when the map is dragged back to its original location
• Improved reliability of random search
• Improved reliability of search on map when zoomed out
• Improved voice quality and reliability
• Minor UI improvements
• Slightly improved application startup time

v0.3375
• Fixed for issue that prevented several users from loading locations
• Fixed occasional crash after loading many locations
• Overall stability improved
• Improved typing
• Improved search and map click location selection logic
• Expressive avatar support

v0.3370
• Another quick fix for Gear VR Android 9 users

v0.3369
• Fixes for bugs affecting some Gear VR users (especially those on Android 9 or those using only the touchpad)

v0.3368
• New Loading screen
• Added home environment with map to track exploration and achievement trophies
• UI transitions are now instantaneous
• UI hover audio
• Crash to blue screen should now be fixed
• Many minor bug fixes
• Quest cross-play support

v0.3348
• Fixed a bug introduced in the previous update that could prevent users who did not already have favorites from adding new favorites
• Minor improvements to appearance of keyboard 
• The date a panorama was shot is now shown in the description

v0.3347
• Fixed a bug in Android 9 that would show the the "No Internet" panel at all times regardless of connection state
• Tips are now displayed in the loading screen
• Favorites can now be organized into folders
• Favorites can now be cut and paste from one folder to another
• A confirmation panel is now displayed when deleting a favorite
• Fixed a memory leak during panorama loading that caused occasional crashes for some users.
• Updated Unity to 2018.3.4f1

v0.3342
This one is a small update, more is coming soon!
• Fixed breaking bug that prevented Gear VR users running Android < 7.0 from loading the application
• Fixed reticle sort order for Gear VR
• Fixed some locations that would not diplay correctly in multiplayer
• Minor performance improvements
• Added loading text when the application first launches and is loading assets

v0.3340
• Pressing back in the collections now returns to your previous position in the list instead of returning to the top.
• Added a return to top button in the collections views
• Hover colors are now slightly darker to make it clearer when the cursor is hovering over a button
• Added ellipses overflow handling to the textbox for editing favorites descriptions
• Multiplayer instructions panel now correctly shows every time a room is joined unless you click "don't show"
• Selected year text had transparency. It is now fully opaque.
• Fixed a bug that could cause infinite loading when reconnecting to the internet
• Fixed a bug that displayed a black panel instead of the correct panel for editing favorite titles. This bug was introduced in 

v0.331
• Fixed a bug that prevented power saving mode from working for some Gear VR users
• Fixed a minor memory leak related to collections and favorites thumbnails
• Minor performance improvements
• Navigation arrows are now hidden when following another user
• Rotation of avatars while following a user is improved
• Now shows who is following who in a multiplayer room. If the player you are following starts following someone else you will still see the unfollow button.
• Some collections locations now include associated information that you can find through an info button next to the location description.
• Fixed at least one cause of broken multiplayer audio.
• Fixed a bug where player panels would sometimes stay when a player left the room
• Fixed a bug where the first panorama would occasionally fail to load with firmware 3.51
• Oculus Parties audio was found to conflict with voice search and Wander's multiplayer voice. We are working on a better solution but for now, to use voice search or multiplayer audio please launch Wander without an active Party.

v0.321
• Added a multiplayer pointer that can be activated by swiping up or deactivated by swiping down. For others to see this pointer both players must be in the same location
• Changed default avatar rotation mode to reflect their true orientation in the scene instead of having them face the user by default.
• Development done for cooredinated app launch (via Oculus Rooms), submitting for approval
• Added option to change privacy settings while in room
• User panorama sphere now disappears if the user is in the same location as you or if the user is following someone else
• Fixed position of settings header text
• Fixed bug that would sometimes prevent joining a multiplayer room
• Fixed a bug where map markers for others in a multiplayer session would remain after the user leaves the room
• Minor performance tweaks
• Still some known bugs with invitations and private rooms but we are working on it

v0.319
• First Release of Multiplayer! We will be testing and improving multiplayer features over the next few weeks. Hope to see you in the world!
• Added Satellite view for map
• Added option to invert swipe directions
• The photographer's name is now always shown in the location description for user uploaded panoramas
• Add error logging to server to improve ability to fix difficult to reproduce bugs
• Fixed bug in voice search that would prevent the search from finishing and that would make it impossible to bring the interface back without restarting (this was hard to reproduce and might not be a perfect fix for all cases)
• Improved error handling when users cannot reach Google or Parkline servers
• Fix for some panoramas that would not load
• Now possible to click description again to remove the current location from favorites (if the current location is a favorite)
• Added a no locations available panel for areas where no wikipedia articles are found near the user
• The message that is shown when no favorites have yet been added has been improved
• Updated to Oculus Plugin v1.29
• Updated Unity to 2018.2.5f1

v0.3375
• Fixed for issue that prevented several users from loading locations
• Fixed occasional crash after loading many locations
• Overall stability improved
• Improved typing
• Improved search and map click location selection logic
• Expressive avatar support
